nodes.title: Json Prompts
widgets_values:
# Prompt List LTXâž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸

This section contains your JSON prompt list for the image to video propmts.

- Each prompt is separated and processed individually per run.
- These prompts are used to generate:
  - **Image-to-video prompts**

nodes.title: SRT file
widgets_values:
# SRT file for beat batched scenes

If your using the new prompt creator that creates the SRT file for beat matches scenes you must enter the path to the file in here so it can be used. If you want to use normal duration mode just set the duration settings to your choice and do not enter anything here.

nodes.title: melband reoformer
widgets_values: If you want to seperate your vocals which is not needed you can you these.

nodes.title: Remake mode
widgets_values:
# Move bad clips to remake folder

At the end of the run, you can move clips you don't like to the remake folder. Then turn on "use remake folder" and hit run. It will remake the clips for you. If you do this more than once make sure to delete any temp files from the folder first.

nodes.title: Show Prompt for LTX for this run
widgets_values: Extreme close-up of two womenâ€™s hands hovering just above clear, calm water, fingers partially submerged. One hand belongs to a blond-haired woman wearing a soft pink shirt, the other to a red-haired woman in muted neutral clothing, visible only through the fabric near their wrists. Their fingers move slightly, disturbing the surface and forming overlapping concentric ripples that intersect between them. The camera remains completely static in position and slowly zooms in toward the hands and rippling water only. The background stays fully out of focus. Warm natural light reflects off the surface, casting soft, undulating highlights across their skin. The mood is intimate, tense, and quietly foreboding.

nodes.title: VRGDG_PromptSplitter_General-LTX prompts
widgets_values:
{
  "prompt1": "A cinematic close-up in an off-center profile shows a woman with medium length blond hair, wearing a pink shirt and jeans. Her brown eyes, initially cast down, slowly lift as a soft smile plays on her lips. Golden light from a nearby window illuminates her face as she begins speaking with passion, her expression filled with quiet intimacy. The camera holds this intimate 85mm look, then begins a slow arc move around her profile, deepening the quiet, reflective atmosphere.",
  "prompt2": "A cinematic shot in a sun-drenched room reveals a woman with long red hair, wearing a blue shirt and jeans, seated on a window seat looking out. A woman with medium length blond hair in a pink shirt and jeans stands nearby, her back partially to the camera, observing her. As dust motes swirl in the hazy, golden air, the blond woman shifts and begins speaking with passion, her voice filled with dawning awareness. The camera performs a slow tracking slide, moving from behind the blond woman to subtly reframe the scene and emphasize the space between them.",
  "prompt3": "A soft focus shot reveals an empty, sun-drenched living room. Warm, amber light filters through sheer, flowing curtains, which drift gently in a subtle breeze. A calm blue throw blanket is draped over a chair, suggesting a recent presence. The camera slowly pans right, gliding across the quiet and reflective space from the window to the chair, allowing the long, tender shadows to stretch and shift across the floor.",
  "prompt4": "An extreme close-up focuses on the slightly parted lips of a woman with medium length blond hair, wearing a pink shirt. Her lips tremble faintly, catching a sliver of late afternoon sun as she begins speaking with passion, a soft, almost imperceptible breath escaping. The camera holds this intimate detail, then executes a very slow pull-back to reveal the subtle tensing of her jaw, emphasizing the intense internal struggle.",
  "prompt5": "A cinematic mid-close shot at a cafe table focuses on a woman with long red hair and a blue shirt and jeans. Honey-gold light from outside illuminates her hair as her green eyes, distant and thoughtful, slowly refocus. She turns her head slightly and begins speaking with passion, her words filled with a quiet reverie, while the cafe environment remains softly blurred in the background. The camera holds steady on her, then begins a slow push-in, drawing closer to her pensive expression.",
  "prompt6": "A cinematic shot shows the reflection of a woman with medium length blond hair, wearing a pink shirt and jeans, in a slightly fogged mirror. Her reflection holds a mix of doubt and forced reassurance. Her brown eyes show a touch of conflict as she speaks with passion to her own image, her breath fogging the glass further. The camera slowly drifts sideways, creating a subtle parallax effect that separates her reflection from reality, emphasizing her internal struggle.",
  "prompt7": "A cinematic shot shows a woman with medium length blond hair, in a pink shirt and jeans, resting her head on her arms on a table. She looks directly at the camera, her wide, vulnerable brown eyes betraying internal knowledge. She lifts her head slightly, never breaking her gaze, and begins speaking with passion, her voice soft but firm. The camera maintains its intimate position, then slowly pushes in, focusing entirely on her expressive, knowing eyes.",
  "prompt8": "A cinematic close-up shot captures a woman with long red hair, wearing a blue shirt and jeans, as she slightly turns her head. A cascade of her fiery red hair catches the late afternoon sun, creating a warm, intense glow. She continues her turn and begins speaking with passion just off-camera, her hair shifting with the movement. The camera follows the turn in a slow arc move, keeping the golden light on her hair as the central focus.",
  "prompt9": "An even tighter, cinematic close-up shot focuses on a section of long red hair belonging to a woman. A direct beam of golden afternoon sunlight illuminates the strands, making them appear to sparkle as they drift with her subtle movements. The background remains softly blurred. The camera executes a slow tilt down, following the shimmering texture and vibrant color of the hair, creating an intense and warm visual.",
  "prompt10": "A cinematic shot shows a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and jeans, her brown eyes slightly widened. Her gaze is transfixed just off-camera, captivated by warm, natural light playing on something unseen. Soft, ambient golden light illuminates her face as she begins speaking with passion, her words a quiet reaction to what she sees. The camera holds her intimate framing before a slow pull-back reveals she is looking towards a window.",
  "prompt11": "A cinematic shot shows two women on a wooden park bench under golden sunlight filtering through autumn leaves. The woman with medium length blond hair in a pink shirt and jeans, and the woman with long red hair in a blue shirt and jeans, are both speaking with passion, their faces alight with genuine laughter. They sit close, but a subtle space remains between them. The camera holds on their joyful interaction before executing a slow pull-back, revealing the complex tension in their proximity.",
  "prompt12": "A cinematic mid-shot focuses on two hands resting on a worn wooden table. One hand, belonging to a woman with medium length blond hair in a pink shirt, is near the hand of a woman with long red hair in a blue shirt. The red-haired woman's index finger subtly traces an invisible circle on the table as both begin speaking with passion just out of frame. The camera slowly pushes in, tightening on the small, tense space between their almost-touching hands.",
  "prompt13": "A cinematic shot in a crowded, indistinct indoor space shows a woman with medium length blond hair and brown eyes, wearing a pink shirt and jeans, leaning comfortably against a woman with long red hair, who is in a blue shirt and jeans. The blond-haired womanâ€™s eyes are closed as she speaks with passion, her words conveying deep peace. The red-haired woman maintains a protective posture, her gentle expression watchful. The camera makes a slow orbit move around them, emphasizing their shared, warm glow.",
  "prompt14": "A cinematic extreme close-up focuses on the delicately intertwined fingers of two women. The fingers of the blond-haired woman in a pink shirt are laced with the fingers of the red-haired woman in a blue shirt. The soft, warm light emphasizes the realistic skin texture and the intense physical proximity. The hands tighten their grip slightly. The camera performs a very slow drift across their hands, highlighting the delicate, certain connection.",
  "prompt15": "A cinematic mid-close shot focuses on the hand of a woman with medium length blond hair, wearing a pink shirt, as it gently brushes against the forearm of a woman with long red hair, wearing a blue shirt. The contact is brief, highlighted by diffused, soft light. As their hands part, the camera slowly tilts up from the point of contact to the red-haired woman's shoulder, implying a reaction that remains unseen.",
  "prompt16": "A cinematic shot frames a woman with medium length blond hair and brown eyes, wearing a pink shirt and jeans, standing with her back to a large window. Her silhouette is distinct against the ambient light, her shoulders slightly hunched. Her wide, focused brown eyes stare into the distance as she begins speaking with passion, her voice tight with internal pressure. The camera slowly tracks forward, moving past her into the soft glow of the interior lamplight.",
  "prompt17": "A cinematic close-up image shows the hand of a woman with long red hair, wearing a blue shirt, resting peacefully on a polished wooden armrest. Soft, warm light highlights the realistic texture of her skin and the wood. Her fingers gently flex, a subtle movement that breaks the stillness, implying a prolonged, comforting presence. The camera holds steady, then begins a slow pan away from the hand, moving along the armrest into the dimly lit room.",
  "prompt18": "In a dimly lit room, a cinematic shot frames two women sitting across from each other. The woman with medium length blond hair in a pink shirt and jeans meets the direct gaze of the woman with long red hair in a blue shirt and jeans. A single table lamp casts soft highlights. The blond-haired woman's expression is vulnerable as she begins speaking with passion, her voice soft, while the red-haired woman listens intently. The camera slowly pushes in on their locked gaze, heightening the unexpressed emotion.",
  "prompt19": "A cinematic mid-close shot focuses on the face of a blond-haired woman with medium length hair and a pink shirt. Her wide, glistening brown eyes show deep vulnerability. Her mouth is slightly open, and she begins speaking with passion, her words caught with intense fear as a single tear glistens at the corner of her eye. The camera holds on her face, then slowly drifts to the side, emphasizing the soft, warm light illuminating her emotional intensity.",
  "prompt20": "A cinematic, very tight close-up focuses on a blond-haired woman's lips, which are slightly parted and trembling faintly. They catch the warm, soft light as she tries to speak with passion, but the words fail to form, conveying an intense internal struggle. Realistic skin texture is visible. The camera maintains this tight focus, then subtly drifts downward, revealing the quivering of her chin.",
  "prompt21": "A cinematic close-up focuses on the intertwined hands of two women in soft, warm light. The blond-haired woman, wearing a pink shirt, has her hand clasped loosely and hesitantly with the red-haired woman, wearing a blue shirt. The blond-haired woman's thumb gently strokes the other's hand as they speak with passion just off-screen. The camera slowly orbits their hands, highlighting the tentative yet intimate connection against a softly blurred background.",
  "prompt22": "A realistic cinematic shot shows a woman with long red hair, wearing a blue shirt and jeans, walking slightly ahead with her back to the camera. Just behind, a woman with medium length blond hair, in a pink shirt and jeans, follows, her brown eyes fixed on the red-haired woman's back as she speaks with passion. Soft golden light casts gentle shadows. The camera executes a slow tracking follow, maintaining the distance between them as they walk.",
  "prompt23": "A realistic cinematic shot shows a blond-haired woman, wearing a pink shirt and jeans, standing alone by a window in a softly lit room. Shadows partially obscure her face as her right hand presses against her chest. Her distant gaze softens as she begins speaking with passion to herself, her voice a quiet whisper. The camera slowly pushes in towards her shadowed face, enhancing the introspective mood.",
  "prompt24": "A realistic, cinematic close-up portrait shows a red-haired woman wearing a blue shirt and jeans. Her green eyes, holding a thoughtful, concerned expression, are looking just off-camera. Soft, warm light casts gentle shadows on her face. Her expression shifts as she begins speaking with passion, her words directed at someone unseen. The camera holds her close-up, then subtly pans in the direction of her gaze.",
  "prompt25": "A realistic, cinematic extreme close-up focuses on the green eyes of a red-haired woman. Her gaze momentarily meets the camera with a flicker of uncertainty before she looks away. Her brow furrows slightly as she begins speaking with passion, her voice barely audible. Soft, diffused light illuminates her eyes and the surrounding skin. The camera holds this intense close-up, capturing every micro-expression.",
  "prompt26": "A realistic, cinematic medium shot shows a red-haired woman in a blue shirt and jeans turning her head to direct her gaze off-camera. Her expression is soft and steady. Her green eyes convey a sense of calm as she begins speaking with passion to someone out of frame, a gentle smile forming on her lips. The camera slowly pans to follow her gaze, revealing an empty space beside her, bathed in soft, warm light.",
  "prompt27": "A realistic, cinematic tight shot focuses on the hand of a red-haired woman wearing a blue shirt. Her hand reaches out slightly in an almost imperceptible gesture, fingers slightly curled. As she speaks with passion off-screen, her fingers unfurl, the movement slow and deliberate. Soft, warm light highlights the contours of her hand as the camera slowly pushes in, emphasizing the weight of the gesture.",
  "prompt28": "A realistic cinematic close-up shows the profile of a blond-haired woman wearing a pink shirt. A soft, resigned expression is on her face as she is bathed in a warm, gentle glow from the side. She turns slightly toward the camera and begins speaking with passion, her words heavy with acceptance. The camera slowly arcs around to a more frontal view, revealing the emotion in her eyes.",
  "prompt29": "A cinematic shot captures a woman with medium length blond hair and a pink shirt, her face buried in her hands. Her shoulders are hunched forward as a tender, soft light illuminates her from above. Her shoulders shake subtly as she speaks with passion, her words muffled by her hands. The camera holds this pose, then begins a slow tilt down her back, emphasizing her vulnerable, withdrawn posture.",
  "prompt30": "A realistic cinematic shot reveals a warm, low-lit scene. A glass bottle of red wine and two half-empty wine glasses rest on a wooden floor beside a soft, textured rug. The deep red wine hue of the light causes long, soft shadows to slowly creep across the floor. The camera performs a slow environmental glide, moving over the glasses and toward the plush rug, enhancing the atmospheric quiet.",
  "prompt31": "A medium-wide cinematic shot of two women seated closely_toggle on a soft, textured rug in a cozy living room. They wear relaxed, casual outfits, leaning slightly toward each other while holding red wine glasses. One woman gently swirls her wine as the other rests her glass on the floor beside a dark glass bottle. The camera slowly dollies in, maintaining shallow depth of field. Warm, low ambient lighting casts soft wine-colored highlights and gentle shadows across the room. The atmosphere feels intimate, calm, and naturally inviting with soft, organic tones.",
  "prompt32": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a red-haired woman, in a soft blue shirt and jeans, resting her head gently on the shoulder of a blond-haired woman, who wears a soft pink shirt and jeans. The blond-haired woman, a serene and content smile on her lips, begins speaking with passion, her voice a low murmur. Soft, warm ambient light fills the cozy living room as the camera slowly pushes in, enhancing the tender atmosphere.",
  "prompt33": "A static wide shot frames a softly lit living room in daylight. Partially drawn curtains allow diffused natural light to seep in, casting gentle shadows across the furniture. Slightly off-center in the composition, an indistinct television glows faintly with a cool bluish hue, casting soft reflections on the ceiling. The rest of the room holds a subdued red wine palette, creating quiet contrast. The content on the TV is blurred, emphasizing its role as ambient light. No characters are present. The scene is still, carrying a sense of unspoken yearning and subdued melancholy.",
  "prompt34": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a blond-haired woman, with medium length hair and wearing a soft pink shirt, gazing downwards with intense, quiet affection. Her soft brown eyes convey deep absorption as she speaks with passion to someone just out of frame. Soft, warm ambient light envelops the scene. The camera starts on her face and then slowly tilts down, following her gaze to an empty space, implying the presence of the other woman.",
  "prompt35": "A cinematic, very close-up, soft focus shot captures a wisp of long red hair belonging to a woman. The strand gently dances in the air, shifting as if stirred by a subtle indoor breeze or her graceful movement. The warm glow of a nearby lamp catches the luminous strands, giving them a soft shimmer. As she speaks with passion just out of frame, her breath and motion blend with the drifting hair, enhancing the intimacy of the moment. The camera remains still, focusing on the vulnerability expressed through the delicate, continuous motion.",
  "prompt36": "A cinematic atmospheric shot inside a cozy room emphasizes the soft, palpable amber light that fills the space. Dust motes dance in the tangible-seeming light, which gently envelops the scene. The light shifts as a breeze from an unseen window causes shadows to sway gently, conveying a feeling of deep, secure, and timeless intimacy. The camera performs a slow environmental glide through the warm, golden-hour-like tones.",
  "prompt37": "A cinematic wide shot on a sandy beach at dusk shows two women silhouetted against a sky painted with amber and rose hues. The blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and the red-haired woman in a blue shirt walk side by side. One of them begins speaking with passion, their voice carrying on the breeze. Their elongated shadows stretch and merge on the sand as the camera slowly tracks alongside them, holding their bittersweet silhouettes against the deepening sky.",
  "prompt38": "A cinematic shot shows a red-haired woman, wearing a soft blue shirt and jeans, standing by a doorway. She looks back over her shoulder, her green eyes holding a lingering, hesitant gaze as she begins speaking with passion to someone off-camera. The scene is bathed in the soft, warm glow of a hallway lamp. The camera slowly pushes in on her face, capturing her reluctant, intimate expression within the shallow depth of field.",
  "prompt39": "A cinematic photorealistic close-up focuses on the hand of a blond-haired woman in a soft pink shirt, resting gently over her heart. Her partially visible face shows profound contentment as she speaks with passion, her soft brown eyes conveying emotional certainty. The camera holds on her hand, then slowly tilts up to her face, capturing the peaceful, knowing look in her eyes.",
  "prompt40": "A cinematic soft focus shot captures delicate green leaves rustling gently in a subtle breeze. The leaves catch the soft golden light, appearing almost translucent and ethereal. The gentle movement creates a quiet, whispering sound. The softly blurred background emphasizes the light play on the leaves as the camera slowly pushes in, creating a mystical and peaceful mood.",
  "prompt41": "A cinematic mid-close shot captures a blond-haired woman, wearing a pink shirt and blue jeans. Her head is tilted gently backward, her brown eyes closed, and a faint, almost pained smile is on her lips. She breathes in deeply, and as she exhales, she begins speaking with passion, surrendering to an overwhelming feeling. Warm, intense sunlight bathes her face as the camera slowly orbits her, highlighting her features.",
  "prompt42": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a red-haired woman, wearing a blue shirt and jeans, speaking with passion, a gentle smile crinkling the corners of her green eyes. In the out-of-focus foreground, a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt watches, her gaze fixed intently on the red-haired woman's smile. The camera slowly racks focus from the red-haired woman to the blond-haired woman's captivated expression, emphasizing the escalating desire between them.",
  "prompt43": "A cinematic photorealistic close-up focuses on a patch of dry, cracked earth. A single, delicate blade of green grass trembles in a faint breeze, struggling to grow amidst the cracks. Soft, diffused natural light casts subtle shadows that highlight the fragile textures. The camera holds on the blade of grass, then slowly pulls back to reveal more of the desolate, cracked ground, enhancing the mood of anxiety and trepidation.",
  "prompt44": "Extreme close-up of two womenâ€™s hands hovering just above clear, calm water, fingers partially submerged. One hand belongs to a blond-haired woman wearing a soft pink shirt, the other to a red-haired woman in muted neutral clothing, visible only through the fabric near their wrists. Their fingers move slightly, disturbing the surface and forming overlapping concentric ripples that intersect between them. The camera remains completely static in position and slowly zooms in toward the hands and rippling water only. The background stays fully out of focus. Warm natural light reflects off the surface, casting soft, undulating highlights across their skin. The mood is intimate, tense, and quietly foreboding.",
  "prompt45": "A cinematic photorealistic wide shot in a vast, golden field at dusk shows two silhouetted figures. The blond-haired woman and the red-haired woman walk towards each other, silient, arms slightly outstretched. As they draw closer, the setting sun glows intensely behind them as the camera slowly pushes in, bringing their closing silhouettes into a tighter, awe-inspiring frame.",
  "prompt46": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and jeans looking directly at a red-haired woman in a blue shirt and jeans. The blond woman's brown eyes are filled with a wistful longing as she begins speaking with passion. The red-haired woman's mouth is slightly open, about to reply. In the intimate, warmly lit space, the camera slowly arcs between their faces, capturing the poignant, nostalgic mood.",
  "prompt47": "A cinematic photorealistic image focuses on a single, delicate, wilting rose lying on a soft, dark, velvety surface. Its deep red wine-hued petals are subtly distorted. A gentle breeze causes a loose petal to tremble and fall onto the surface. Soft, focused light from above illuminates the flower as the camera slowly tilts down, following the falling petal, creating a mood of bittersweet acceptance.",
  "prompt48": "A cinematic photorealistic close-up shows the intertwined hands of a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and a red-haired woman in a blue shirt, resting firmly on a warm, wooden surface. The focus is sharp on the subtle tension in their fingers as one hand gives a gentle squeeze. They are both speaking with passion just off-camera. The camera slowly pushes in, heightening the solemn, threshold-like mood of the moment.",
  "prompt49": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and a red-haired woman in a blue shirt standing very close, facing each other in an intimate, softly lit space. Their gazes are locked, their faces half-shadowed by a tender, warm glow. They begin speaking with passion at the same time, their voices overlapping in a moment of profound, yearning silence. The camera slowly orbits them, wrapping around their shared space.",
  "prompt50": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and jeans looking down, her mouth slightly agape. A look of anguish is in her brown eyes as she struggles to find words, beginning to speak with passion before her voice breaks with regret. In a softly lit, introspective environment, the camera holds on her face, then slowly drifts down, focusing on her trembling hands which she clenches into fists.",
  "prompt51": "A cinematic photorealistic close-up focuses on the hand of a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt as it gently reaches out, hovering inches from the hand of a red-haired woman in a blue shirt. The space between them is charged with intimacy. The blond-haired woman begins speaking with passion, her fingers trembling as she speaks. The camera holds on the tense space between their hands, then slowly pushes in even tighter, amplifying the unspoken connection.",
  "prompt52": "A cinematic portrait shows a red-haired woman with long hair, wearing a blue shirt and jeans. Her wide green eyes are directly focused with an open, attentive expression as she listens to someone just out of frame. She nods slowly, her lips pressed together, before she begins speaking with passion in reply. With a shallow depth of field, the camera holds on her face, then subtly drifts to the side, hinting at the other person's presence.",
  "prompt53": "A cinematic photorealistic shot shows a blond-haired woman in a pink shirt and jeans and a red-haired woman in a blue shirt and jeans sitting closely together, holding hands. Their eyes meet directly, their expressions soft and contemplative as they begin speaking with passion in hushed tones. Golden light bathes them in a warm, intimate atmosphere. The camera starts wide and slowly pushes in, focusing on their intertwined hands.",
  "prompt54": "A cinematic close-up portrait shows a red-haired woman in a blue shirt. A subtle smiles appears as she listens to someone off-camera. Her green eyes look softly into the distance. Her smile widens as she begins speaking with passion, her voice relaxed and warm. The soft focus shot, bathed in gentle light, slowly pushes in to capture her serene expression.",
  "prompt55": "A cinematic wide shot shows a woman with medium-length blond hair wearing a soft pink shirt and a woman with long red hair wearing a blue shirt lying side-by-side on a plush rug. Their heads rest close together as they gaze upward, their bodies still and relaxed. Their hands lightly touch between them at the center of the frame. The camera remains perfectly stable and slowly zooms in toward their hands, emphasizing the subtle contact. Warm, muted natural light fills the room, casting soft, elongated shadows across the floor and fabric, creating a quiet, intimate, and contemplative atmosphere.",
  "prompt56":"Wide cinematic shot from behind of two women walking side-by-side along a quiet shoreline, framed small against an expansive beach. One woman has medium-length blond hair, wearing a soft pink shirt and jeans; the other has long red hair, wearing a blue shirt and jeans. They move steadily forward, footprints forming a gentle trail in the sand. The camera slowly tracks behind them at a distance. The ocean stretches to the left with rolling waves, a light breeze moving hair and fabric. Golden-hour sunlight, warm highlights, long shadows, calm and reflective tones."
}

A cinematic photograph of these two young women sitting on the hood of a vintage car during golden hour.  The sky is warm with pink clouds, the mood is nostalgic. Camera is angled slightly above, capturing the moment from the carâ€™s windshield. Natural color tones.

nodes.title: Prompt for this run
widgets_values: Using both provided headshots as face and hair reference only, generate a cinematic, photorealistic image. Two womenâ€”the blond-haired woman wearing a soft pink shirt and the red-haired woman in muted, neutral clothingâ€”stand close together at the edge of clear, calm water. Each woman extends one hand toward the surface, their fingers partially submerged, creating overlapping, subtle concentric ripples that intersect between them. The moment feels intimate and tense, as if they are sharing a silent, fragile decision. Warm, gentle light reflects off the water, casting soft, undulating highlights onto their hands and lower arms. The lighting is natural and cinematic, with a mood of quiet dread and terrifying vulnerability. Focus is sharp on both hands and the rippling water, with the background softly falling out of focus. No text overlays

nodes.title: Nano Banana
widgets_values:
# Nano Banana + Image Switch Notes ðŸŒ

Use the Nano Banana node with image switch nodes to attach reference images directly to prompts.

- Supports up to **4 reference images** when using Nano B.
- Image switch nodes control which reference image is active.
- Designed for prompt-by-prompt reference handling.
- When the **Prompt Creator workflow** is used, each prompt
  automatically receives the correct reference image.
- No manual reassignment needed per batch.

# Full Workflow Walkthrough Video

This video walks through the complete Nano Banana process  
from start to finish using a real video project.

### ðŸŽ¬ Walkthrough Video
ðŸ”— [Watch the Video](https://youtu.be/UDK_wOuid1Q)

Shows full setup, prompt workflow, reference image usage,
and the exact process used to produce the final result.

inputs.text: A medium close-up shot features a Caucasian man with a closely shaven head and face, wearing a black baseball cap with "PNTR" in white letters on the front, and a dark grey t-shirt with "JUST DO IT" visible across his chest. A small black microphone is clipped to his shirt collar. He is positioned slightly to the left of the frame, looking intently downwards and to his right, his eyes focused off-camera. His facial expression is one of deep concentration, with his brow slightly furrowed. As he looks down, a quick sniff sound is heard, and then he speaks with a deep male voice and a slightly frustrated tone, saying, "I think it's so bad." The camera remains static throughout, maintaining a shallow depth of field, which keeps the man in sharp focus while the background is softly blurred, revealing a light-colored wall with white wooden shelving or trim, and a partially open white wooden door on the right. After a brief pause, another short, audible sniff is heard. The man then continues to speak, his voice maintaining the same quality, as he states, "So bad. So bad." He elaborates further, emphasizing his point with a final statement, "This got to be, it's got to be the worst tool I've ever seen."
